description: Starts a CIS session. This API is used by the Amazon Inspector SSM plugin to communicate with the Amazon Inspector service. The Amazon Inspector SSM plugin calls this API to start a CIS scan session for the scan ID supplied by the service.

parameters.name: message
parameters.description: The start CIS session message. The unique token that identifies the CIS session.

nested_params.name: sessionToken
nested_params.description: The unique token that identifies the CIS session.

parameters.name: scanJobId
parameters.description: A unique identifier for the scan job.
